FuncDef: This command configures the ETH-CFM maintenance endpoint (MEP).
CLIs: mep <mep-id> domain <md-index> association <ma-index> [ direction { up | down } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maintenance association end point identifier. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the maintenance domain (MD) index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the MA index value. Values-1 to 4294967295.

Indicates the direction in which the maintenance association (MEP) faces on the bridge port. Direction UP is not supported on VPRN MEPs. Values-down - Sends continuity check messages away from the MAC relay entity..
